title.native: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

description:
Koshi Torako has everyone fooled. Her classmates see her as the perfect honor student, unaware of her secret delinquent past. But her new picturesque school life is thrown into chaos when she bumps into Shikanoko Noko, a girl with antlers! Mayhem seems to follow this strange doe-eyed girl. Who, or what, is she?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: Each episode streamed 4 days early on some streaming services. The original TV broadcast started on June 7th, 2024.
hashtag: #しかのこ #MyDeerFriendNokotan #しかのこのこのここしたんたん
synonyms: Minha Amiga Nokotan é um Cervo
Mi Amiga Nokotan es un Ciervo

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Satire
tags.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Horticulture
tags.description: The story prominently features plant care and gardening.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Agriculture
tags.description: Prominently features agriculture practices.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Time Loop
tags.description: A character is stuck in a repetitive cycle that they are attempting to break out of. This is distinct from a manipulating time of their own choice.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

node.description: He began playing classical piano at the age of 5 and learned other instruments from his experience playing with a brass band (flute) and rock band (drums). After graduating from the Nihon University College of Arts he worked as a composer at KOEI, working on the music for a number of their games. He left the company in 2006 and has since been composing for TV, anime, and movies.
Originating from [GONZO](https://anilist.co/studio/3/). Currently an Animation Producer at [WIT Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/).

__Birth Name:__ Sakiko Fujita (藤田咲子)

[Blog](https://blog.goo.ne.jp/sakky-ohana) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakitaf_1019)

She is best known in Japan for sampling her voice for the Vocaloid, Hatsune Miku.

__Height:__ 155 cm (5'1")
__Nicknames:__ ハンメグ (Hanmegu), グミたん (Gumi-tan), 潘ちゃん (Han-chan)
__Hobbies:__ Making sweets, Hitokara (solo karaoke)

[Profile (Atomic Monkey)](http://www.atomicmonkey.jp/jp/archives/talent/megumihan) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/meg-han/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/han_meg_han) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/32248.html) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/han_meg_han/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/megumihanfans) | [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/meghanmeg.bsky.social) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Megumi_Han) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/潘めぐみ)

Megumi Han is the daughter of voice actress [Keiko Han](https://anilist.co/staff/95760). She debuted as a actress in the 2008 live-action film _Sakura no Sono_ prior to debuting as a seiyuu in the 2011 broadcast of _Hunter x Hunter_. According to Han, _Hunter x Hunter_ was the first manga series she bought in elementary school.

(Source: MyAnimeList)

__Non-anime roles:__~!
• Ai in "All to the Sea" (Movie)
• Alec in "Granblue Fantasy" (VG)
• Asuha Uehara in "Kiwokurosuto" (VG)
• Brian in "Granado Espada" (MMORPG)

[Profile](https://www.amuse.co.jp/artist/A8990/index.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/izm_tako)

Fuuka Izumi is a voice actress affiliated with Amuse from Aichi Prefecture, Japan. She was previously affiliated with VIMS, and is a graduate of Nihon Narration Engi Kenkyuujo.

The founder and representative director of [Twin Engine](https://anilist.co/studio/6199/). Originally a producer for [Fuji TV](https://anilist.co/studio/169/), where he produced numerous anime for the Noitamina programming block.
